root.name: rotate()

example.code:
v = None
def setup(): v = PVector(10.0, 20.0) println(v) # Prints "[ 10.0, 20.0, 0.0 ]" v.rotate(HALF_PI) println(v) # Prints "[ -20.0, 9.999999, 0.0 ]"

root.description: Rotates a vector by the specified angle (2D vectors only), while maintaining the same magnitude.
